name: MARV 2EX
shortDescription: Extractive dust monitoring system for wet gases in explosive atmospheres (ATEX Zone 1/2).
longDescription: The MARV 2EX is designed for continuous measurement of dust concentration in industrial processes saturated with moisture, such as after wet scrubbers or in condensing environments. It provides isokinetic sampling, accurate linear measurement, and constant dust level monitoring up to 0.1 mg/m³. The system features PLC and HMI visualization for easy parameterization and complies with legally regulated measuring instruments (Certificate No. UA.TR.001 46-19).
features: Isokinetic sampling under variable flow conditions
Constant dust level measurement up to 0.1 mg/m³
Accurate linear measurement for all types of dust
PLC visualization software and HMI (local and web)

applications.description: Measures dust concentration before reuse of gas in a boiler or gas turbine.
Monitors dust emissions after wet scrubber cleaning or before reuse of converter gas in a boiler.

name: Industrial Sensor X1
shortDescription: Multi-purpose industrial sensor for temperature and humidity monitoring.
longDescription: The Industrial Sensor X1 provides reliable measurements for industrial applications. It is designed for continuous monitoring and supports data integration with PLCs and SCADA systems.

applications.description: Monitor environmental conditions in production facilities.

name: Gas Flow Meter G3
shortDescription: Precision gas flow meter for industrial process control.
longDescription: The Gas Flow Meter G3 ensures precise flow measurements for a variety of gases. It is suitable for both high and low-pressure applications.

applications.description: Monitor and control gas flows in chemical reactors and pipelines.

name: Optical Particle Monitor OPM-5
shortDescription: High-sensitivity particle monitor for industrial environments.
longDescription: The OPM-5 provides real-time monitoring of airborne particles. It is ideal for clean rooms, laboratories, and industrial facilities where dust control is critical.
features: High sensitivity and low detection limits

applications.description: Measure and report airborne particle concentrations in controlled environments.
